messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] valerie
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/7/2004 1:39:49 PM Eastern Daylight Time, valerie@ubpub.com writes: I guess  I should intro now... I m Valerie Fitzenreiter, author of The
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/7/2004 1:39:49 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
valerie@... writes:

I guess I should intro now... I'm Valerie Fitzenreiter, author of
The Unprocessed Child: Living Without School. I radically unschooled
(NO homeschooling..ugh) my daughter Laurie all of her life and my
book tells about how I did it. Laurie is about to leave the nest to
pursue her Masters/PhD and I'm going to be a basketcase.<<<<<<<<<
And Valerie will be speaking at the Live and Learn Unschooling Conference in
Peabody, MA, August 27029, 2004!

See you there, Valerie!

~Kelly, big fan





[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
